title: ‘BFF’ is Not Zuckerberg’s Secret Tool to Save Your Facebook Data
subtitle: No, typing BFF in a comment box on Facebook won’t safeguard your data, in case you were wondering.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Typing BFF in a comment box on Facebook won't safeguard your data, in case you were wondering.

A viral message doing the rounds on Facebook reads,
